showScoreExcerpt:
“[It’s] like a hormonally confused teenager, riddled with conflicting impulses and given to impulsive lurching in different directions. Everyone involved seems convinced it is a dazzlingly original twist on a classic fairy tale: Cinderella is feisty! She has agency! She's no princessy pushover! It's a trope stated so regularly you can set your watch by it. But despite such gritted-teeth determination, Bad Cinderella is a strangely rudderless enterprise. This Cinderella is all dressed up with nowhere to go.”

Read more

keyPhrases.quote: Bad Cinderella is a strangely rudderless enterprise.
